name: Sakura Minamoto
description: After waking up as a zombie with no memories of the past, she started working as an idol to save Saga prefecture. After getting back her memories and being depressed for a short period, she finally got back on stage with her teammates. She's a kind, hardworking and sweet girl who speaks in local dialect.

passiveSkill.name: What should I do?
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Sakura's HP is near 0, she becomes Zombified, inheriting 150% ATK, 100% DEF and 100% HP. All attacks will target random single enemies and cannot gain Rage.Team Skill: Deploy Sakura, Ai and Junko.Triggered Effect: When Sakura, Ai or Junko attacks, other allied idols will launch a combo attack."}

uniqueSkill.name: Saga Attack
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to all enemies and inflicting Bad Luck, causing the target to receive ATK * 60% after every action, as well as gain one of these debuffs for 1 round: Stun, Silence, ATK -30%, DEF -30%."}

specialSkill.name: Punch Of The Dead!
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Sakura deals {placeholder} damage to an enemy and reduces enemy's ATK by 20%Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Fran Chou Chou's No. 1
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to all enemies and inflicting Bad Luck, causing the target to receive ATK * 60% after every action, as well as gain one of these debuffs for 1 round: Stun, Silence, ATK -30%, DEF -30%.
